entities.name: teddy
entities.description: Teddy is mentioned as someone who comes round for dinner about four times a week.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one suggesting that Teddy should live with them.

entities.name: james
entities.description: James is enthusiastic about inviting Teddy to live with them and suggests sharing a room with Al.

entities.name: albus
entities.description: Albus is mentioned as someone James would share a room with.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as Professor Longbottom at school.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny tells James to give Neville their love.

relationships.description: Harry suggests inviting Teddy to live with them.
James is willing to share a room with Al.
Ginny asks James to give Neville their love.
